text: Moth and Rust is a 1921 British silent drama film directed by Sidney Morgan and starring Sybil Thorndike, Malvina Longfellow and Langhorn Burton. ==Cast== * Sybil Thorndike as Mrs Brand * Malvina Longfellow as Janet Black * Langhorn Burton as Ray Meredith * Cyril Raymond as Fred Black * George Bellamy as MacAlpine Brand * Malcolm Tod as Sir George Trefusis * Ellen Nicholls as Lady Trefusis * Phyllis le Grand as Lady Anne Varney ==References== ==Bibliography== * Low, Rachael. The History of the British Film 1918-1929. George Allen & Unwin, 1971. ==External links== * Category:1921 films Category:British films Category:British drama films Category:British silent feature films Category:English-language films Category:Films directed by Sidney Morgan Category:1921 drama films Category:British black-and-white films
title: Moth and Rust
